title: Metadata/Structured descriptions
description: This object contains metametadata, i.e. information about the structured description(s) of the OER and its source(s).

id.title: URL of the metadata
id.description: If resource is only referenced take the URL the metadata-set that is refering to the resource. If resource is hosted by metadata provider oersi_mainEntityOfPage.id is identical to resource id.

provider.title: Metadata provider
provider.description: Quelle, von der die strukturierte Beschreibung (=Metadaten) zu dieser Ressource zur Verfügung gestellt werden.

dateModified.title: Date of last modification of the metadata
